titleStmt.title: Observations, both historical and moral, upon the burning of London, September 1666 with an account of the losses, and a most remarkable parallel between London and Mosco, both as to the plague and fire : also an essay touching the easterly-winde : vvritten by way of narrative, for satisfaction of the present and future ages / by Rege Sincera.
titleStmt.author: Rege Sincera.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Ratcliffe, and are to be sold by Robert Pawlet ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
